movies.title: La nouvelle femme scorpion - prisonnière n° 701

biography.bio: Yumi Takigawa was born on February 16, 1951 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for School of the Holy Beast (1974), Le cimetière de la morale (1975) and Spellbound (1999).
biography.name: Yumi Takigawa

biography.bio: Yûsuke Natsu was born on October 30, 1950 in Arao, Kumamoto, Japan as Hisayuki Taura. He was an actor, known for La nouvelle femme scorpion - prisonnière n° 701 (1976), Jun-ai sanga: Ai to makoto (1974) and Stray Cat Rock: Wild Jumbo (1970). He died on January 27, 2010 in Japan.
biography.name: Yûsuke Natsu

biography.bio: Yoko Konno is an actress, known for La nouvelle femme scorpion - prisonnière n° 701 (1976).
biography.name: Yoko Konno

biography.bio: Ichirô Nakatani was born on October 15, 1930 in Sapporo, Hokkaido, Japan as Masaaki Nakamura. He was an actor, known for Yojimbo (1961), Harakiri (1962) and The Sword of Doom (1966). He died on April 1, 2004 in Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Ichirô Nakatani

biography.bio: Mitsuyo Asaka was born on February 20, 1931 in Kanda, Tokyo, Japan as Akiko Yoshida. She is an actress, known for Hare tokidoki satsujin (1984), Sachiko no sachi (1976) and Enko no kizuna (2002).
biography.name: Mitsuyo Asaka

biography.bio: Ryôko Ema was born on February 25, 1952 in Japan. She is an actress, known for Furyô anego den: Inoshika Ochô (1973), Ano kanji (1976) and Sukeban: Tamatsuki asobi (1974).
biography.name: Ryôko Ema

biography.bio: Bunsaku Han was born on April 15, 1948 in Tokyo, Japan as Fan Wenshiao. She was an actress, known for Love Letter (1995), Stray Cat Rock: Wild Jumbo (1970) and Stray Cat Rock: Machine Animal (1970). She died on November 5, 2002 in Chiyoda, Tokyo.
biography.name: Bunsaku Han

biography.bio: Shingko Jo is an actress, known for Mahiru no Jôji (1972), Maruhi: jorô ichiba (1972) and Onna tengoku: Kodane moraimasu (1972).
biography.name: Shingko Jo

biography.bio: Nobuo Kaneko was born on March 27, 1923. He was an actor, known for Ikiru (1952), Shogun (1980) and Battles Without Honor and Humanity (1973). He was married to Yatsuko Tan'ami. He died on January 20, 1995.
biography.name: Nobuo Kaneko

biography.bio: Yûko Kanô was born on March 16, 1953 in Yamagata, Japan. She is an actress, known for Sukeban: Tamatsuki asobi (1974), Girl boss: Les étudiantes en cavale (1973) and Kyofu joshikôkô: Furyo monzetsu guruupu (1973).
biography.name: Yûko Kanô

biography.bio: Genji Kawai is an actor, known for The Resurrection of the Golden Wolf (1979), A Fugitive from the Past (1965) and Invasion of the Neptune Men (1961).
biography.name: Genji Kawai

biography.bio: Flower Kiss is an actress, known for La nouvelle femme scorpion - prisonnière n° 701 (1976).
biography.name: Flower Kiss

biography.bio: Nenji Kobayashi was born on February 7, 1943 in Katsuragi, Wakayama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Le samouraï du crépuscule (2002), Love and Honour (2006) and Fuzoroi no ringotachi (1983).
biography.name: Nenji Kobayashi

biography.bio: Ryûko Koyama is an actress, known for La nouvelle femme scorpion - prisonnière n° 701 (1976).
biography.name: Ryûko Koyama

biography.bio: Yôko Kôno is an actress, known for Zenka onna: koroshi-bushi (1973) and La nouvelle femme scorpion - prisonnière n° 701 (1976).
biography.name: Yôko Kôno
